title: These cult-favorite beauty brands are having huge sales right now
text:
These cult-favorite beauty brands are having huge sales right now

These cult-favorites from Benefit and First Aid Beauty just got a lot more affordable. (Photo: Asos)

— Our editors review and recommend products to help you buy the stuff you need. If you make a purchase by clicking one of our links, we may earn a small share of the revenue. However, our picks and opinions are independent from USA Today’s newsroom and any business incentives.

Attention beauty lovers, we have two epic sales to brief you on that'll have you whipping out your credit card faster than you can say "hello gorgeous!" Right now, cult-favorite beauty brands Benefit Cosmetics and First Aid Beauty are each offering a 20% discount on their sites, meaning now's the perfect time to re-up on all the tried-and true favorites that you use everyday.

Whether you're a Hoola bronzer loyalist or an Ulra Repair Cream super-fan, you can currently save big on both brands' beauty and skincare goodies sitewide.

First Aid Beauty's award-winning products—including their moisturizers, facial cleansers, scrubs, serums and more—are known far and wide for being ultra nourishing, hydrating, and perfectly suitable for all skin types. Whether you want to stock up and save on the OGs—their Ultra Repair Cream or Pure Skin Face Cleanser, or try out some new products that have been making waves—like the the Hello FAB Coconut Skin Smoothie Priming Moisturizer (I like to mix this with my foundation, and it's glorious), all you have to do to is apply the code FABFAM20 at checkout to knock 20% off your order. And if you spend over $50 you'll get free shipping, huzzah!

Meanwhile over at Benefit's website, you can fill your cart with their best-sellers—Hoola Matte Bronzer, They're Real Mascara or POREfessional Face Primer, or perhaps invest in a few of their beloved brow products to get those Insta brows you've dreamed about. Our beauty editor, Jess Kasparian, can't recommend them enough: "Benefit is very loved for its brow products, including the Gimme Brow+ Volumizing Eyebrow Gel and the Goof Proof Brow Pencil. Each product helps shape and style your brows, so they look sleeker, fluffier, featherier, or however you like them." To get these ride-or-die faves at a discount, just view your shopping cart and enter the code FRIENDS to get a sweet 20% off in savings.

Shop on First Aid Beauty and get 20% off your order with the code FABFAM20

Shop on Benefit Cosmetics and get 20% off your order with the code FRIENDS

The product experts at Reviewed have all your shopping needs covered. Follow Reviewed on Facebook, Twitter, and Instagram for the latest deals, reviews, and more.

Prices were accurate at the time this article was published but may change over time.
